relation: The cafeteria has decent food, but some of the prices are a little expensive especially for college students. The benifit is being close to costco and a few other food places.
I am almost complete with my AA and capable of transfering. Some classes have gone great, while others, the teachers taught at a higher academic level than where we should be at.
Make sure that you have a path figured out. To get in and get out so you don't get trapped at this school. Take the necessary classes and major in a field of your interests.
Overall its a great school. The teachers here are a hit or miss. There are those whom have made a great impact and directed me to the attention to the major in the field of psychology.
pageTitle: Las Positas College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Enroll in classes early, you might end up with classes you don't really need. In three sentences Las Positas is a very caring College. They put their students first. They make sure they are in a very comfortable environment. Login to rate or flag the reviews Katlyn from Livermore, CA 02/08/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 44 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Las Positas College is great for students who do well with more one-on-one help and feel more comfortable in a more interactive environment. I definitely take advantage of teacher's office hours to work with them and as questions and couldn't have asked for more help. I also feel like this environment is far less intimidating than to be on a huge campus where you feel rushed to get to your classes. This is a much more low-key option but also very friendly and helpful. Tips for prospective
